doc.name: currentPage

syntax.example: set the currentPage of EPS to pageNumber

doc.summary: Specifies the page being displayed in a multi-page EPS object.

examples.example: set the currentPage of EPS 6 to (1 + the currentPage of EPS 6)

description.p: Use the currentPage property to switch between the pages of an EPS object.
The currentPage of an EPS object is an integer between 1 and the EPS object's pageCount.
This property is supported only on Unix systems with Display PostScript installed.
